name: MyEnglishLearner
0:
”Alexa, start My English Learner”
”Alexa, launch My English Learner”
”Alexa, open My English Learner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my english learner
des: Hello, English teacher! You have to teach English to one of your students in a private lesson from now. If you say something in English, your student will repeat the same word, phrase or sentence after you. He or she might be unable to follow you correctly, but please continue the lesson. Once your student becomes a good English speaker, your pronunciation will also be improved enough. Please bring your textbook or flash cards here!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
